subject: Re: [junit] Executing methods of test reflectively?
msgSnippet: On Friday 19 November 2004 20:09, supreme_java_guru_1 wrote: [very long message snipped] Have a look at the TestListener interface. -- Jason Rogers I am
messageBody:

Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
